name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nkowa okwu - Igbo Dictionary and Translation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate Igbo and English on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to learn Igbo as you browse the web? Now you can with the Nkọwa okwu Igbo Translate and Dictionary Chrome extension.

You can select to translate text by double clicking words within any webpage to see their Igbo translation along with Nsịbịdị and authentic, human-recorded audio pronunciations.

This extension is powered by Nkọwa okwu and the Igbo API which hosts thousands of reviewed and verified Igbo words and their definitions.

Come across a word that's not in the dictionary? Then you can suggest adding the word to the dictionary for our in-house translators to review. You'll be able to directly contribute back to this completely free Igbo-English dictionary resource.

Note:
If you're unable to play audio back within the popup that's in the browser's page, click on the extension's icon in the top right corner, search for the same word, and then play back the audio.
